website_summaries.verdict: An excellent kit for travel, or for anyone who wants to try a sampling of products to discover a variety of what Drunk Elephant has to offer.
pros: Contains three of the brand's popular products – D-Bronzi Sunshine Drops, Virgin Marula Oil, and Lippe Balm – for soft, smooth skin and a great look
Bronzer creates a natural-looking glow for most skin tones
cons: Sizes are somewhat small, but the products tend to last
Consumers with very light skin will need to apply the bronzer carefully so it doesn't look too dark

customer_reviews.title: Get this TODAY
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. I will be purchasing full size of these ESPECIALLY the bronzing serum! So good for the skin and I’ve replaced my makeup with it for the work week!!
customer_reviews.author: Mckenzie miller

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a gift for a friend. She loved it! Now she is interested in trying other products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Ok price for what you get. I suggest just going full size. More value
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product because I knew i liked the debronzer and wanted to try the other products. haven't had the change to try face oil yet but chapstick is ok. too expensive for me.
customer_reviews.author: ahusofdijlkfndfas

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Missing an item
customer_reviews.text: Wow I spent this much to only receive part of my order? It was missing the Lippe balm! It took forever to arrive it’s for a gift that’s already late and now to get my items I have to return it! Total bs
customer_reviews.author: Linda Doak

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: I love all this company’s products but they are just too expensive for me to use.
customer_reviews.author: Teddi

customer_reviews.title: new favorite beauty products
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorite beauty products! Lip stuff is best I’ve ever found! Face oil is amazing!!! Bronzer is excellent too! Love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Frank

customer_reviews.title: Staple in my cosmetics
customer_reviews.text: Love it’s a must have . Insanely wonderful quality products for the brand
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Great products!
customer_reviews.text: Love drunk elephant! The mini bottles are a great way to try products to decide what ones work the best with your skin. All of these products work great and I plan on buying full sized products soon.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Loved testing a new product that I will now continue to buy in full size
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product and will definitely be buying the full size now!
customer_reviews.author: ashley kane

customer_reviews.title: Great value set
customer_reviews.text: Drunk elephant is one of my favorite skin care brands. It is also expensive. This is a great way to try the product without spending a lot. No need to glob on the products either, very nice on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: James McClain

customer_reviews.title: Good products. Slightly overpriced
customer_reviews.text: I love these products. The lip balm is very hydrating, the dbronzi works very well, and the face oil is moisturizing. The only thing is that they are a lot smaller than I expected. Kind of over priced for the size that they are.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel B.

customer_reviews.title: Missing stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and only got two thing in my box very upset missing the facial oil 😩🥺🥺🥺🤬🤬🤬
customer_reviews.author: Eliana

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the D-bronzi drops. I mix it with my moisturizer and it gives me a nice glow.
customer_reviews.author: camie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: The items are travel size and for your money it’s okay but luckily the results from the product make up for the price so it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Songer

customer_reviews.title: Missing part of the order!
customer_reviews.text: I am missing the Virgin Marula Luxury Facial Oil. I only received two of the three products! 😡😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that was delivered was the face oil. Not a set of items.
customer_reviews.author: shea werner

customer_reviews.title: SCAM!
customer_reviews.text: Complete rip off! Lip balm was not even in the package!?
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love drunk elephant products and this is a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love this company and these products, ended up buying two of each! Worth it if you’re just trying it out
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little kit!! I use it all the time!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica black

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Product came used and missing one of the three items
customer_reviews.author: Allison R

customer_reviews.title: These products are awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try these products from drunk elephant I loved how small they were the perfect size and price to sample and I love them I have sensitive skin so it is soooo hard to find anything that won't cause me to breakout or turn red. The serum is so soft and isn't oily, the bronzer is awesome!! And adds the perfect amount of bronze to your skin. And the lip balm is my favorite I've ever used. Let's just say I'm really sad I'm running out after using them for the last 3 weeks
customer_reviews.author: becky.palmieri

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love! I was hesitant to spend so much money on these products before being able to try them out. I will definitely be buying full size products. Love the bronzer, it’s light and not too overwhelming and the facial oil is not greasy, it’s just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Beshears

customer_reviews.title: A great gift set
customer_reviews.text: So this actually exceeded my expectation. All 3 products in this set are nice products. I especially like the marula oil for giving me some light moisture when my face or neck are dry. The sun drops were surprisingly pigmented. I use it as a light liquid bronzer. The lip balm has a great texture and feel and it’s got a slight sweetness which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Robin

customer_reviews.title: Lots of air in these little bottles
customer_reviews.text: The products are great and the mini bottles are eye candy, but the only ones with adequate amounts of product in the little tubes are the chapstick, facial oil, and bronzer - save your money for a full size bottle or try The Ordinary brand.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

product_meta.title: Drunk Elephant Out of Office Daytime Skin Care Set with D-Bronzi Anti-pollution Sunshine Drops, 8 Milliliters, Virgin Marula Luxury Facial Oil, 3 Milliliters, and Lippe Balm, 3.8 Grams
product_meta.description:
THE DRUNK ELEPHANT DIFFERENCE
With a mission to deliver clinically-effective, clean skincare products formulated with both cutting-edge synthetic and natural ingredients, Drunk Elephant knows that every ingredient should directly benefit the health of your skin or the safety of the formulation. 

 OUT OF OFFICE SET
A daily dose of nourishing vitamins for your complexion. 

 - 8 ml D-Bronzi Anti-Pollution Sunshine Drops
Formulated with ingredients like Vitamin D, Marula Oil, and Vitamin F, to replenish and support your skin’s complexion, while also delivering a bronzy finish. 

 - 3 ml Virgin Marula Luxury Facial Oil
Straight from the “pip” of the marula fruit, Virgin Marula Oil is untouched by chemicals or fragrances. This luxurious oil reduces fine lines, wrinkles, redness, and blotchiness, while improving your skin's elasticity. 

 - 3.8 g Lippe Balm
A rare combination of peptides and sea fern algae hydrates the lips and helps to restore collagen, increasing lip moisture and adding volume to give better definition to the lip-line. 

 NO FRAGRANCE
After carefully balancing the best ingredients available, Drunk Elephant doesn’t have to add anything to mask their natural scents. When you smell their products, you will likely detect nothing but a glycerin base with slight hints of Marula oil, Zinc Oxide, Thermal Mud, Fruit Enzymes, and Vitamins for a refreshing and reassuring scent. 

 COMMITTED TO CLEAN
Drunk Elephant is committed to using only clean ingredients that either directly benefit the skin’s health, or support the integrity and effectiveness of their formulas. You’ll never find the “Suspicious 6” (Essential Oils, Drying Alcohols, Silicones, Chemical Screens, Fragrances/Dyes and SLS) in their products.
feature_bullets: OUT OF OFFICE SET. This set includes the essentials for that just-got-back-from-somewhere glow! Pair Marula Oil with D-Bronzi for a flawless bronze finish, and apply Lippe for long-lasting moisturized lips.

THE PERFECT TRIO. D-Bronzi Sunshine Drops provides sunshine in a bottle, mimicking the benefits of Vitamin D, while the Virgin Marula oil delivers a dosage of omegas 6 & 9 for rejuvenated skin. Top it off with the Lippe Balm for noticeably plump lips with this Vitamin C infused lip balm.

NO QUESTION IN QUALITY. A routine is only as good as its worst product, and a product is only as good as its worst ingredient. Drunk Elephant is dedicated to your internal health and external skin health; "If there's any DOUBT, it's OUT.”

SENSITIVE VS. SENSITIZED. When skin is exposed to irritants and sensitizers, damage can be imperceptible and cumulative, leaving it in a reactive mode. "Sensitive" skin is often just skin that has become sensitized over time by harsh additives

MADE IN THE USA. Drunk Elephant doesn’t take shortcuts or compromise ingredients to save money. They are hands-on and will stay true to their ethos. Their products are designed, tested, and made in the United States. Drunk Elephant is certified cruelty-free, they have never, nor will ever, animal test or allow products to be tested on animals.
